recipesJson.name: Vanilla Frosty (The bad man wont hurt you anymore)
recipesJson.author: DumHed
recipesJson.description: As I awoke from an old man Van Dusky's "sleepy time tea" induced coma in the woods, I saw a volunteer sheriffs department officer out of the corner of my eye and grabbed his attention. He had informed me that my mother was worried sick and he would bring me back home asap. Once I saw my mother, she cried and said she would take me to Wendy's. On the way to wendy's she told me "the bad man wont hurt you anymore, and a vanilla frosty would make it all better"

reviews.text: Dude, wtf is with your description?? Really weird. Especially for a abuse victim like myself. Just, really odd choice there.
Very Nice Frosty recipe! I added a few drops of HA Australian Chocolate. Just like Arby's Frosty!! Juicy and rich with nice vanilla sweetness.

pageContext.name: Vanilla Frosty (The bad man wont hurt you anymore)
